item.title: Two Sum and some Follow-up Problems
item.description: Two sum is the first problem on leetcode, it's a simple one. However, by relaxing some restrictions, the problem could become more interesting. In the post I'll discuss some cases. The Simplest Case: return only one solution This one is just the problem 1 on leetcode, which is described as following: Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.
